name: Bit Templates Playground
onCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg && mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg && apt-get -y install nodejs && dotnet dev-certs https --trust && dotnet tool install dotnet-ef --global --version 8.0.0-rc.1.23419.6 && export PATH="$PATH:/root/.dotnet/tools" && dotnet-ef database update --project src/Server/Api/Bit.TemplatePlayground.Server.Api.csproj && dotnet build src/Client/Web/Bit.TemplatePlayground.Client.Web.csproj
